thread.title: Open houses for October 10 - 11, 2015

author: KIRSTEN O'BRIEN, SEATTLEPI.COM STAFF
title: Open houses for October 10 - 11, 2015
text:
The Broadview neighborhood wasn't given its name in jest -- the area just south of Shoreline was named for its expansive, panoramic views of the Puget Sound and the Olympic Mountains.
Homes in the area tend to be pricier than homes elsewhere in Seattle because of the beautiful views. The median list price for Broadview homes is $757,000, while the median sale price is $550,000, according to the last 90 days of sales data from Redfin. Take note that two of these homes are in Broadview while the third is farther inward in Haller Lake.
These three homes range from $409,950 to $2.49 million. Scroll through the gallery above to see when each will be hosting an open house this weekend. Then, see other recent real estate features below:
Brick beauty in Magnolia Seattle tiny home makes "best of" list Real Estate Profile: West Seattle
